title: Emerald and Diamond Petal Haaram - A Touch of Tradition
features: Delicate petal-shaped links alternate with emeralds, creating a modern twist on the traditional haaram. The central pendant features a cascading leaf design, entirely encrusted with shimmering diamonds. The piece showcases a delicate milgrain setting, enhancing the brilliance of the gemstones.
occasions: and contemporary festive occasions. Also suitable for upscale social events and evening wear.
description: A seamless blend of traditional design and contemporary aesthetics. The vibrant emeralds are carefully selected for their rich color and clarity, complemented by the dazzling diamonds. Crafted with meticulous attention to detail, this haaram is a timeless investment piece that will be cherished for generations.
